SubSection.Title: Report Summary
SubSection.Description: This provides a high level summary of the findings that the analysis produced. Also includes basic information on the scope of the scan.
SubSection.Text: On $SCAN_DATE$, a source code review was performed over the $PROJECT_NAME$ code base. $SCAN_SUMMARY$ were scanned. A total of $TOTAL_FINDINGS$ issues were uncovered during the analysis. This report provides a comprehensive description of all the types of OWASP Top Ten 2010 issues found in this project. Specific examples and source code are provided for each issue type.

SubSection.Title: Issue Summary
SubSection.Description: A table summarizing the number of issues found and the breakdown of issues in each OWASP Top Ten 2010 category
